dataSet.name: DataSet

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Object = Section Then CASE WHEN Section = Value(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) Then "<For all sections and objects, except specified>" End Else Object End
CASE WHEN User = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) Then "<" + Presentation(Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers)) + ", except specified>" Else User End
CASE WHEN Section = Value(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) Then "<Common date>" Else Section End

CASE WHEN SettingOwner = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) Then "<" + Presentation(Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers)) + ", except specified>" Else SettingOwner End

dataSet.query:
SELECT DISTINCT CustomizedUsersWithGroups.User AS User, ChangeProhibitionDates.User AS SettingOwner, ChangeProhibitionDates.Section, ChangeProhibitionDates.Object, ChangeProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate, PriorityCodes.Value AS Priority INTO ProhibitionDates FROM InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates INNER JOIN (SELECT 0 AS Code, 1 AS Value
UNION
SELECT 1, 2
UNION
SELECT 10, 3
UNION
SELECT 1000, 4
UNION
SELECT 1001, 5
UNION
SELECT 1010, 6
UNION
SELECT 1100, 7
UNION
SELECT 1101, 8
UNION
SELECT 1110, 9) AS PriorityCodes ON (CASE WHEN ChangeProhibitionDates.User = VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) THEN 0 WHEN VALUETYPE(ChangeProhibitionDates.User) = Type(Catalog.UsersGroups) THEN 1 WHEN VALUETYPE(ChangeProhibitionDates.User) = Type(Catalog.ExternalUsersGroups) THEN 1 ELSE 10 END + CASE WHEN ChangeProhibitionDates.Object = ChangeProhibitionDates.Section THEN 0 ELSE 100 END + CASE WHEN ChangeProhibitionDates.Section = VALUE(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) THEN 0 ELSE 1000 END = PriorityCodes.Code) INNER JOIN (SELECT CustomizedUsers.User AS User, UsersGroupsContents.UsersGroup AS UsersGroup FROM (SELECT UsersGroupsContents.User AS User FROM InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates INNER JOIN InformationRegister.UsersGroupsContents AS UsersGroupsContents ON ChangeProhibitionDates.User = UsersGroupsContents.UsersGroup AND (FALSE IN (&SpecifiedUsers))
UNION
SELECT UsersGroupsContents.User FROM InformationRegister.UsersGroupsContents AS UsersGroupsContents WHERE UsersGroupsContents.User IN(&SpecifiedUsers)) AS CustomizedUsers INNER JOIN InformationRegister.UsersGroupsContents AS UsersGroupsContents ON CustomizedUsers.User = UsersGroupsContents.User
UNION
SELECT VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers), VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) WHERE (FALSE IN (&SpecifiedUsers) OR TRUE IN (&SpecifiedUsers))) AS CustomizedUsersWithGroups ON (ChangeProhibitionDates.User IN (VALUE(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers), CustomizedUsersWithGroups.UsersGroup)) AND (ChangeProhibitionDates.Object <> UNDEFINED) AND ((NOT(ChangeProhibitionDates.Object <> ChangeProhibitionDates.Section AND ChangeProhibitionDates.Section = VALUE(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef)))) ;
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// SELECT DISTINCT ProhibitionDates.User, ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner, ProhibitionDates.Section, ProhibitionDates.Object, PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.ProhibitionDate, ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate AS DateBanSettings, ProhibitionDates.Priority AS SettingPriority, ChangeProhibitionDates.Comment AS CommentSettings, PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.Comment FROM ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates INNER JOIN (SELECT PriorityDates.User AS User, PriorityDates.Section AS Section, PriorityDates.Object AS Object, PriorityDates.ProhibitionDate AS ProhibitionDate, MAX(ChangeProhibitionDates.Comment) AS Comment FROM (SELECT ProhibitionDates.User AS User, ProhibitionDates.Section AS Section, ProhibitionDates.Object AS Object, MAX(ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate) AS ProhibitionDate, MAX(ProhibitionDates.Priority) AS Priority FROM ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates INNER JOIN (SELECT ProhibitionDates.User AS User, ProhibitionDates.Section AS Section, ProhibitionDates.Object AS Object, MAX(ProhibitionDates.Priority) AS Priority FROM ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates
GROUP BY ProhibitionDates.User, ProhibitionDates.Section, ProhibitionDates.Object) AS MaximumPriority ON ProhibitionDates.User = MaximumPriority.User AND ProhibitionDates.Section = MaximumPriority.Section AND ProhibitionDates.Object = MaximumPriority.Object AND ProhibitionDates.Priority = MaximumPriority.Priority
GROUP BY ProhibitionDates.User, ProhibitionDates.Section, ProhibitionDates.Object) AS PriorityDates INNER JOIN ProhibitionDates AS ProhibitionDates ON (ProhibitionDates.User = PriorityDates.User) AND (ProhibitionDates.Section = PriorityDates.Section) AND (ProhibitionDates.Object = PriorityDates.Object) AND (ProhibitionDates.Priority = PriorityDates.Priority) AND (ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate = PriorityDates.ProhibitionDate) INNER JOIN InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates ON (ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner = ChangeProhibitionDates.User) AND (ProhibitionDates.Section = ChangeProhibitionDates.Section) AND (ProhibitionDates.Object = ChangeProhibitionDates.Object) AND (ProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate = ChangeProhibitionDates.ProhibitionDate)
GROUP BY PriorityDates.User, PriorityDates.Section, PriorityDates.Object, PriorityDates.Priority, PriorityDates.ProhibitionDate) AS PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons ON ProhibitionDates.User = PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.User AND ProhibitionDates.Section = PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.Section AND ProhibitionDates.Object = PriorityDatesWithExceptionReasons.Object INNER JOIN InformationRegister.ChangeProhibitionDates AS ChangeProhibitionDates ON ProhibitionDates.SettingOwner = ChangeProhibitionDates.User AND ProhibitionDates.Section = ChangeProhibitionDates.Section AND ProhibitionDates.Object = ChangeProhibitionDates.Object WHERE (NOT((NOT FALSE IN (&SpecifiedSections)) AND ProhibitionDates.Section <> VALUE(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) AND (NOT ProhibitionDates.Section IN (&SpecifiedSections)))) AND (NOT((NOT FALSE IN (&SpecifiedObjects)) AND ProhibitionDates.Object <> ProhibitionDates.Section AND (NOT ProhibitionDates.Object IN (&SpecifiedObjects))))

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN User = Value(Enum.ProhibitionDatesPurposeKinds.ForAllUsers) Then 1 Else 0 End
CASE WHEN Section = Value(ChartOfCharacteristicTypes.ChangingProhibitionDatesSections.EmptyRef) Then 1 Else 0 End
CASE WHEN Object = Section Then 1 Else 0 End
